en.description: A Battle Avionics that leave a trail that deals continuous  Heat damage to enemies touching it. Fiery Phoenix accumulates damage every second while active and will unleash it upon deactivation, damaging all enemies in range. The Railjack will also gain a speed boost and damage reduction while active. Flux Energy Cost: 50 Flux on use. 5 per second while active
